value.desc: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

input.desc: Emitted when component's model changes; Is also used by v-model

model-view.desc: View to be displayed on td click

finishEdit.desc: Function to call to finish edit mode; suggestion: on control blur

cancelEdit.desc: Function to clal to cancel edit; suggestion: on invalid value provided
